description: When a hard reboot is requested by the user, the VMware driver issues a soft boot instead. The driver never issues hard reboots while the VM has guest tools installed.
title: VMware Soft Reboot not honored

comments.content: When a soft reboot is requested by the user, the VMware driver issues a hard boot instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hartsock

comments.content: The vmware driver behavior currently conforms to new API standards.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hartsock
